column4: hello, is it possible to have 2 ISOs in apt sources? it is a laptop, so it would be convinient to have both ubuntu-dvd and kubuntu-dvd plugged in since connectivity is not always avail?
yeah you could mount the iso... then add it using apt-cdrom or system > admin > software sources
however they both contani the same ;)
they just install different things during instillation
